overview:
Highly experienced online entrepreneur, who has successfully created, developed and managed 4 Internet and eCommerce companies into profit and international expansion. Results-oriented, enthusiastic and motivational people leader, with very sharp business insight and analytical skills. Proven ability to manage ideas from plans into viable businesses.

Core competencies include:

  • Strategic Marketing - Business Modeling.
  • Product and Service Development.
  • Defining, Creating & Optimizing Applications for Operations.
  • Team Recruitment & Team Building.
  • Turn around failing Organizations, Products and Services.
  • Executive Level Negotiations & High Level Communications.
